snippet: Kansas State's Collin Klein stands out among the three remaining undefeated title contenders, but Texas A&M freshman Johnny Manziel proved he's one to watch after leading the Aggies past Alabama.
abstract: Kansas State's Collin Klein stands out among the three remaining undefeated title contenders, but Texas A&M freshman Johnny Manziel proved he's one to watch after leading the Aggies past Alabama.
